name.description: The name of the releasable composition

parentPathFromBase.description: The path to the parent, measured from the base. If the base is the parent, you can enter an empty string

distPathFromBase.description: The path to the releasable module from the base of the project. The base is the directory that contains all modules

modules.description: A sorted list with all modules. The plugin uses the ordering of this list to traverse the modules

groupId.description: The Maven groupId for this dependency

artifactId.description: The Maven artifactId for this dependency

path.description: The path from the parent to this dependency. For a module, it's from its parent, otherwise it's from the base dir

subModuleOf.description: If this dependency is part of a module (parent pom with modules that are released together), specify the releasable parent here

groupId.description: The Maven groupId for this dependency

artifactId.description: The Maven artifactId for this dependency
